title: Data Science Project on – Handwritten Digits
description: Let’s consider one piece of the optical character recognition problem in Data Science- The identification of handwritten digits. Here we will take a shortcut and use Scikit-Learn’s set of preformatted digits, which is built into the library.
description_lemmatized: let consider one piece optical character recognition problem data science identification handwritten digit take shortcut use scikitlearns set preformatted digit built library
